document.title: WISCONSIN ESSENTIAL ELEMENTS FOR English Language Arts

8E4B3EDB9B28429C8B352D2719D0D57F.description:
With guidance and support, link two
or more words together in
communication.

D4578DB02E8445D39518DD407988A525.description:
With guidance and support,
demonstrate understanding of
common prepositions: on, off, in,
out.

3E476518698D4A3CA24558D05781D1FF.description:
With guidance and support, identify
answers to simple questions (e.g.,
who, what) from an array of choices.

DBDCE588EA5B439FABB62D254F340080.description:
With guidance and support, use
frequently occurring plural nouns.

85ED09BB785749869E5568BA4F3A4B0A.description:
With guidance and support, use
frequently occurring nouns in
communication.

83674F4BE668407389806586456FC00B.description:
With guidance and support,
distinguish between letters and
other symbols or shapes.

7D0F21779C024A3E9EC3F65CFF2F61BF.description:
Demonstrate emerging
understanding of letter and word use.

7BFC8108C7664B4FB21A2F1A1715C05C.description:
With guidance and support, use
words acquired through conversations,
being read to, and during shared reading
activities.

A6266E5CE69B4BEB869E41A9DC1B8C2E.description:
With guidance and support,
demonstrate an understanding of
common verbs.

1F716F407AB94A0983910D5826F46655.description:
With guidance and support, use
words to communicate in real-life
situations.

2A44A5264F2B4CD3B6A9B4109B016B90.description:
With guidance and support,
demonstrate understanding of
frequently occurring opposites.

267D72FAB07041508D7FACBE7DD6FABF.description:
With guidance and support, sort
common objects into familiar
categories.

D0EB512E762D402282B33E0C0682F544.description:
With guidance and support, ask
questions about unknown words.

6FC98A63E0404E9192F8C439BA6C0442.description:
Demonstrate emerging
understanding of word relationships.

DD44D903D56E471C81947AF8B573E6CC.description:
With guidance and support,
demonstrate understanding of
words used in every day routines.

D944CE8B63F447E68200688F01F046D5.description:
Demonstrate emerging knowledge
of word meanings.

3DAB7B3152FC4CB6BD63AB95A3498B98.description:
Use language to achieve desired
outcomes when communicating.

22E20848C80643799FB5B00F9161B929.description:
With guidance and support, add or
select drawings or other visual or tactile
displays that relate to familiar people,
places, things, and events.

25792251E54D463C94A6FDD68649F4E6.description:
With guidance and support,
identify familiar people, places, things, and
events.

87FB366456CF4C99AB6E71C30489C44E.description:
With guidance and support,
demonstrate an emerging understanding of
a familiar text read aloud or information
presented orally or through other media by
answering questions

4DF5D059207B48A59B9E4F6A84882725.description:
Consider individual differences
when communicating with others.

69C5D392B9EA4A8AA878E3C6DAC182F9.description:
Respond to questions about the
topic or text.

19D77F0DBEFF4176938B29818B45E884.description:
Participate in multiple-turn
communication exchanges with
support from adults.

9AE29AD67C4F44E4914A5DCF52DE1DC0.description:
Communicate directly with
supportive adults or peers.

FD5A3F3834724CBD9172774E342C9C09.description:
With guidance and support,
participate in collaborative conversations
with diverse partners about topics and texts
with peers and adults in small and larger
groups.

F3B7E6010687445F964AAACF8E636DAB.description:
With guidance and support from
adults, recall key details from literary or
informational texts.

CB56B15F737D4577934079FC73B05FCC.description:
With guidance and support from
adults, identify information, objects, or
events that relate to personal experiences.

6E51E38BB2A64DC7AB8DF407DBE6316D.description:
With guidance and
support, participate in shared inquiry and
writing projects.

EDA27E628E084511AD77D760330A699B.description:
With guidance and support from
adults, explore a variety of digital tools to
produce individual or group writing. With
guidance and support from adults, produce
writing through printing (including letter like marks or forming some printed letters).

3F475B2E54024D2381EED0B9F654BA4F.description:
With guidance and support from
adults, add more information to their own
drawing, dictation, or writing to strengthen
it.

807A933EED1B468CBB0D590C3766478D.description:
With guidance and support, use
a combination of drawing, dictating and
writing to create a text that uses words
familiar to the student.

546DCE049DCE4A3D8F3DF3B996AEBBAC.description:
Convey events, real or imagined
and narrate a single event or
several loosely linked events.

999BF8EECC2943AF82C6E4694687C9FB.description:
Informative/Explanatory text in
which they provide some
information about a predetermined
or self chosen topic.

772A0688A0CF43D89BE1FD637E43E0ED.description:
Opinion pieces in which they state
an opinion.

BA8DB9348A08432789E19B5B3FEFBC93.description:
With guidance and support, use
writing, dictation and/or drawing to
compose:

04D0DE9B7A6C4EAFB9600F3380CED2C4.description:
With guidance and support, use
drawing, dictating, or writing to compose
writing for a variety of high-stakes and lows takes purposes.

610DDF3FCC454F2C816A22D716050566.description:
With guidance and support,
match similar parts of two familiar texts,
identifying the adventures or experiences
of a character. (RI&RL)

A7D73F1C4A8D4FF5B2821C59EEC22AB6.description:
With guidance and support,
identify points the author makes intext.
(RI)

D49D81EAA7AE4605B6B0DEE41A4A1009.description:
With guidance and support,
identify illustrations or objects/tactual
information that go with the text. (RI&RL)

F2744D23E7B040A488D2B3380DBA9D9E.description:
With guidance and support,
distinguish between words and
illustrations/graphics in a text. (RI&RL)

1339E3A610524D1BA54AD8408CDAF5C6.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize familiar texts (e.g., storybooks,
poems, informational texts) and locate the
front cover of the book. (RI&RL)

00FF704BFF064709AEC5EC743486C209.description:
With guidance and support,
indicate when an unknown word is used in
a text. (RI&RL)

6B4F37DCBD0C41F78713CE0D20BB49CE.description:
With guidance and support,
identify characters and settings (RL)
or important details and events (RI) in
familiar texts.

92B462B0D7514C608FC2E729FE8ECA81.description:
With guidance and support,
identify major events (RL) or the topic in a
familiar text (RI).

436456EDE2DD47139A8245F8B88737C0.description:
With guidance and support,
identify details in familiar texts.(RI&RL)

C898830531C34E108350F66798180DBD.description:
Engage in purposeful shared
reading of familiar text.

9DFCF50A88D44719BCD9B0F59D342DBF.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize environmental print.

B2B0697944ED4713B9D5093769CBCB0B.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize first letter of own name in
print.

E86E9E6C69A24674B6B2EB48EA13CAD5.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize if words are minimal pairs

895C0F8276524A409F7CA788F46FC338.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize the number of sounds in
three-phoneme(consonant-vowel-consonant, or CVC) words

B75AC39394AF41F2B41372000CC5A454.description:
With guidance and support, identify
single syllable spoken words with
the same onset(beginning sound) as
a familiar word.

7CB979FBF2024B90B63D3E9AA7565F8B.description:
With guidance and support, identify
syllables in spoken
words.

06FB296BFCC94B1C956276DEB53F17EA.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize the number of words in a
spoken message.

522A17A8A23C401F998ADAD5AF6ADD75.description:
With guidance and support,
recognize rhyming words.

F8328768F6764639AD0F8E4A92C337B2.description:
Demonstrate emerging
understanding of spoken words, syllables,
and sounds (phonemes).

3CCA94FA88A046BEAD9286AC492A4A03.description:
With guidance and support during
shared reading, demonstrate
understanding that books are read
one page at a time from beginning to
end.

2F3BC212B57343E1BD87EC48EB6DBA1D.description:
Demonstrate emerging
understanding of the organization of print.
